comment: Data Service DCAT-AP 2.0 schema adapted to DTDL from smartdatamodels.org. Source: https://raw.githubusercontent.com/smart-data-models/dataModel.DCAT-AP/master/DataServiceDCAT-AP/schema.json
description: Data Service adapted from DCAT-AP 2.0 specification, but extended with additional properties and compatible with NGSI standard

contents.name: accessRights
contents.comment: This property MAY include information regarding access or restrictions based on privacy, security, or other policies

contents.name: alternateName
contents.comment: An alternative name for this item

contents.name: areaServed
contents.comment: The geographic area where a service or offered item is provided

contents.name: dataProvider
contents.comment: A sequence of characters identifying the provider of the harmonised data entity.

contents.name: dateCreated
contents.comment: Entity creation timestamp. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: dateModified
contents.comment: Timestamp of the last modification of the entity. This will usually be allocated by the storage platform.

contents.name: license
contents.comment: This property contains the licence under which the Data service is made available.

contents.name: source
contents.comment: A sequence of characters giving the original source of the entity data as a URL. Recommended to be the fully qualified domain name of the source provider, or the URL to the source object.

contents.name: dataServiceDescription
contents.comment: This property contains a free-text account of the Data Service. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the description

contents.name: endPointDescription
contents.comment: This property contains a description of the services available via the end-points, including their operations, parameters etc. The property gives specific details of the actual endpoint instances, while dct:conformsTo is used to indicate the general standard or specification that the endpoints implement.

contents.name: endPointURL
contents.comment: The root location or primary endpoint of the service (an IRI).

contents.name: owner
contents.comment: A List containing a JSON encoded sequence of characters referencing the unique Ids of the owner(s)

contents.name: servesDataset
contents.comment: This property refers to a collection of data that this data service can distribute.

contents.name: title
contents.comment: This property contains a name given to the Data Service. This property can be repeated for parallel language versions of the name.
